Pre-Game Insights: Josh Naylor returns to action for the Cleveland Guardians after being injured and is batting.243 with 27 doubles, 31 home runs, and 58 walks this season.
Josh Naylor has struggled against Tigers' starter Tyler Holton, going 1-for-7 in his career and 0-for-5 this season.
Tyler Holton, the Tigers' starter, has a 2.19 ERA and 7.3 strikeouts per nine innings this season, but has not yet achieved a quality start in 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the first of the ALDS series between the Cleveland Guardians and Detroit Tigers.
Josh Naylor has a history of driving in runs, including 61 times in 152 games this season, and has been strikeout-heavy with 55.3% of his games this year.
Others: The game is scheduled for 1:08 PM ET on October 5, 2024, on TBS.
Josh Naylor has a 60.5% success rate in reaching base, including 39 games with multiple hits, and has scored at least one run in 44.1% of his games.
